title: F
clause_text: F.S.I. No condonation in the required open spaces, parking and other requirements in these regulations shall be allowed. However, for the proposals in respect of existing building, such condition need not be insisted upon and the proposal shall be cleared only after strictly conforming to structural and fire safety norms.
section: Buildings Abutting Two or More Streets

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
